website_summaries.verdict: Safe collar for dogs who are out at night, as it has a reflective material over the top.
pros: Multiple colors available in the collar and in the thread used for the personalized letters and numbers
Room for up to 25 characters, so you can add a phone number
cons: Uses a nylon base and plastic buckle, so it may not last as long as some others

customer_reviews.title: cheap plastic buckles break, this was made for a cat.
customer_reviews.text: Revised review; Danger to your dogs well being, Don't buy!!! the buckles are undersized cheap brittle plastic. I almost lost my dog forever because this broke at a really bad moment. The buckles are Chinese crap >>Original review; This makes my jet black Plott more visible both night and day. Collar seems well made and embroidery has a clean look. A note of caution on ordering, make sure the preview screen is accurate or order error occurs.<< Photo shows a real buckle next to the cheap buckle, see the difference, cheap cheap cheap.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I purchased 3 for black, brown and silver labs. Mostly wanted for reflective. After 3 months 1. Can barely read the names on two and none of them were good for reflective. 2. One snapped on my dog..Never happen at a good time. I don't use because I don't know when the others will snap and the main purpose for us is useless. Cannot see them in the dark with flashlight or headlight.
customer_reviews.author: Toast-n-Jam

customer_reviews.title: this was totally useless.
customer_reviews.text: Caution.....plastic broke after only a few weeks. This put my lab in a very dangerous situation. Not only did she get loose but she was loose without a collar as the plastic snapped and the collar fell to the ground. I got this collar for safety in that someone would call us on the rare occasion that she got loose. As the collar was lying in our yard, this was totally useless.
customer_reviews.author: Theresa A.

customer_reviews.title: Majority of the collar is reflective
customer_reviews.text: The majority of the collar is reflective (silver). Meaning, if you choose a blue color, there is actually very little of the collar that is blue. Therefore, when choosing a color for your embroidered information, use a dark color (like black). I purchased a blue color with white embroidery. You can barely read the information because it is stitched on the reflective/silver part of the color. Also, if you need to return the item, seller does not provide postage-paid return label. You must pay for the postage yourself. So guess what? Yup, I'm keeping the collar even though it is not legible and unsatisfactory.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa L

customer_reviews.title: i am very pleased with these collars and have just purchased my second ...
customer_reviews.text: i am very pleased with these collars and have just purchased my second round of them. They have held up very well but I have 2 large dogs (German Shepherds) and they play & wrestle a lot and my male rolls around on the ground every day so the ones I've had for about 3-4 years were looking a bit worn. New collars were not necessary at all but rather a choice to spiff up a bit. Both my dogs are microchipped and have never gotten out of our property but still I like that their names & tel # can easily be seen on the collars plus they are reflective which is a bonus. I would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Linda H.

customer_reviews.title: Not recommended
customer_reviews.text: This item is really disappointing. I ordered the medium size per their chart but in order for the collar to fit my german shorthair I have to adjust the collar so much that the buckle covers the phone number. They use all the extra room to place their logo in a visible place and its way too long for a medium. Not recommended for dogs with skinny necks.
customer_reviews.author: David H

customer_reviews.title: This product will get your pet back home!
customer_reviews.text: Two years ago I unfortunately had to rehome our farm dogs and when the dogs ran off recently - I received the calls when they were found. Both dogs were microchipped, but it was the collars that saved them. The were dirty with years of use, but still very legible. They held up great! The collars are well printed and the reflective component is highly visible in the dark. . That’s how they were found. I live in town now and am in the process of ordering the collars for my small dogs and indoor cats. They’re all microchipped- but my recent experience says ,”Get the collar”.
customer_reviews.author: .d.hogan

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding customer service
customer_reviews.text: Outstanding customer service! I bought the collar for my dog using my cell phone right before hurricane just in case I had to evacuate. They were extremely prompt and getting me the collar that I needed for the safety of my dog and addressed any issues I needed as quickly as possible. The color itself is high-quality and exactly what I need. My boy loves his collar. I would recommend this company without hesitation to anyone needing a safety collar for their dog.
customer_reviews.author: M. D. Minuth

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding reflectivity - AWESOME for my kiddo's protection at night.
customer_reviews.text: These collars are AWESOME! Outstanding reflectivity - even with minimal light around. I can see my dog all the way in the far back of my yard at night without lights on.... at least 300 feet away. These are durable and the embroidery job is great. Get creative with your color matching. For a little dog like a 5 pounder - you might consider getting a cat collar instead. The small one is bulky on my little one but not enough for me to keep it off of her. My interaction with the company was top-notch.... very responsive and pleasing!
customer_reviews.author: Puddintain

customer_reviews.title: So good now we want one for back up!
customer_reviews.text: Ordered the large size for our larger than average Labrador. Took the advice of another reviewer and stayed away from ordering the embroidery thread as a light color - we opted for black. It shows up perfectly against the silver reflective color. Buckle is strong plastic and shows no signs of being too weak to hold when he pulls on the leash (oh look a rabbit!). It came very quickly in the mail. Highly recommended - there is no reason not to buy this if you are in the market for one. It’s one of the best pet purchases we have made.
customer_reviews.author: BurqueK

customer_reviews.title: Surviving our two lab puppies!
customer_reviews.text: We have two 10 month old lab puppies who have gone through 5 dog tags and 3 dog collars. They either were destroyed in puppy battles or fell off and were lost. I finally decided to try the Go Tags collars, particularly because they are reflective, which is great for our black labs. They have survived the first few weeks, although they did get dirty pretty quickly and are no longer very reflective. But our dogs are constantly in the snow and the water, so I wasn't expecting them to stay pristine for more than about 5 minutes. So far so good, and I would definitely recommend these.
customer_reviews.author: M. Turner

customer_reviews.title: It's  a very nicely made collar. Good value for the money.
customer_reviews.text: I don't know why a rating was there for stretch, no one would want a collar that stretches! The collar is very nicely made, looks very durable! My only issue is that I should have bought a small instead of a medium, the collar is way to big for my girl. When I can afford to get another, I will reorder a small. This is a very nice looking and durable collar! I'm happy to have ordered the glow in the dark model! I've bought plenty of collars and harnesses in the past and this collar is the best made collar I've ever purchased!
customer_reviews.author: pottsie57

customer_reviews.title: Good collar, avoid my mistake
customer_reviews.text: It's a nice collar. Don't make the same error I did. I got the black collar so I chose white stitching for the personalization. The reflective tape is over the entire collar and is very light gray. White stitching barely shows up against it. Only choose white stitching if you want the personalization to be very discreet and only visible up close.
customer_reviews.author: R. Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Good, but embroidery not visible when made smaller
customer_reviews.text: The embroidery should start further to the left near the "GoTags"patch. The left side can't be adjusted. Unfortunately, once I adjusted my dog's collar, the phone number can't be clearly seen. What a shame! Otherwise nice. I had previously purchased a collar from another seller which did not have this issue (and cost less). The only reason I was willing to pay $19 for a collar was for the personalization- but the most important part- the phone number is covered with a buckle. Too bad. Product arrived promptly.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: Love these. and the price is certainly good. I never have to worry about her if she were misplaced. I have had others that made her neck sore, but not these. This is the second one I have purchased. I really like the reflection and large lettering. Very sturdy, but they do get to the point where they are so rasty, nasty looking and no longer come clean in the laundry even with a good soak. Then it is time for a new one. My dog is a country dog so she rolls and wallows in dirt and mud and other disgusting things.
customer_reviews.author: Fair Play Farmer

customer_reviews.title: Looks great!
customer_reviews.text: We love our reflective embroidered collar on our dog! I picked the black with orange stitching. The embroidery looks awesome! Big and clear, very visible and easy to read, and the reflective part is an added bonus. I'm scared to attach a leash to it as I've read many reviews saying theirs broke and our dog a strong puller (despite our many exhaustive hours of training, sigh), but we just attach a second collar to him for walks and that works fine. Even though our dog is microchipped, we wanted an easy way for people to identify and help him if he ever slips out of the house so for our purpose, this collar is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Hoang

customer_reviews.title: Measuring is the most important step
customer_reviews.text: I have two collars now. The most important thing you can do is measure first and order the smallest collar that will fit. My 50# heeler should have gotten a small. She was right at the cutoff so I ordered a medium and to make it fit, the buckle now covers part of the phone number. Not really a big deal, but it would have been better if it didn't require the adjustment. The collar is well made and I like the darker stitch colors better. I have the neon green on one and it is a little harder to read than the dark purple I chose for the other one. Overall, very happy with my purchases.
customer_reviews.author: Ann Reese

customer_reviews.title: These are great collars!
customer_reviews.text: We first ordered these collars in 2018. Now we are replacing them in 2020. Why? There was nothing wrong with the first set. Not one broken stitch, tear, etc. The only reason we replaced them is because our phone number changed. My big dogs (one 80 lbs the other 120 lbs) aren't easy on collars. They go out in the woods nearly every day, swim in the ponds, go through every mud hole, and through every briar and thorn patches they can fine. Yet, they never damaged the original set of collars. That says everything about the quality of these collars!
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Great collar for our terrier
customer_reviews.text: We really needed both a reflective and informational collar for our terrier. This collar is great because it doesn't have a dangling tag like her old one that kept catching on things and ultimately fell off. This collar has our phone number and her name stitched on in big letters so it is easily read if she gets lost. The stitching is clear and permanent so it won't fall off. The reflective strip is really bright when the light hits it at night, so the whole thing suits us perfectly. I am really glad we got it and our dog likes it much better than her previous collar with the dangling tag that was always in her way.
customer_reviews.author: Amy Goebel Padgett

customer_reviews.title: This is a great collar
customer_reviews.text: We bought one of these collars a couple years ago and has been worn by our 50lb bully boy daily for two years and some of the reflective coating is starting to wear off. Other than that this collar is in great condition. There's no damage to the embroidered thread or nylon of the collar itself. He doesn't spend much time outside so I can speak to those kind of conditions and longevity. Because of its durability we purchased one for our friends high energy Retriever.
customer_reviews.author: Alifoxx

customer_reviews.title: Reflection collar is amazing!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the pink reflecting personalized collar for my black rescue dog. We walk a lot in the early morning hours before it is completely light outside, so her safety was my main priority. The reflection is bright and easily seen with any light hitting it at all. Her name and my phone number are large enough to read from several feet away (even without my reading glasses) so if she were to be lost, someone could give me a call without actually touching her. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Looks great and highly visable
customer_reviews.text: I am very pleased with the craftsmanship of this collar. While I'll admit the buckle does feel cheap as mentioned in other reviews, I don't forsee that being an issue for us. Our boy is a pretty beefy (beagle/American bulldog mix) but compact 50lb dog. Around the neck and chest is where he is the widest. A medium collar fits him usually at its longest or a large at its smallest. The medium size fits him perfectly (I was a little worried upon opening it) with a bit of room still. Overall very satisfied with this product! It makes us feel better knowing that the reflective aspect will make him more visable at night on walks out to potty.
customer_reviews.author: Liz

customer_reviews.title: Just order it. You won’t be disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: Can’t say enough good things about it. The reflective material works great when I take my dog on runs in the morning and evening. Have gotten so many compliments on the collar and how good it looks. Sturdy material, and very easy to read the name and lettering. I originally got one for my first dog Kodak, and have just purchased another for my new dog Kimber. Very happy with my purchase. Be careful getting salt water on the collar because it will leave the reflective material spotted. I should’ve known this, but had my dog at the beach all day in it without thinking. Still an amazing product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great collar but poor placement of the lettering
customer_reviews.text: The collar is great and the reflective strip really increases visibility at night. The only problem we had was the embroidery was started too far from the non-adjustable end so the adjustment buckle obstructed some of the phone number. Had they started the monogram closer it would have been perfect but the took up some space with the collar’s logo instead. We contacted the seller and they took care of it right away and replaced it with a collar with a different buckle which solved the problem.
customer_reviews.author: Ron S

customer_reviews.title: Reflective as advertised
customer_reviews.text: I always worry when I order products that claim to be reflective, whether or not they will live up to my expectations. This collar does. The color of the thread is exactly as it appears online. The collar appears silver/grey in the photos, which is it in very low light. Any other time, it is so reflective that it appears white in direct sunlight. I purchase a medium, for my puppy to grow into. I am very happy. Since I just received it, I am uncertain how durable it will be. The threading and construction materials feel very sturdy. It is not stretchy.
customer_reviews.author: Stacy

customer_reviews.title: Reflective material begins to deteriorate immediately
customer_reviews.text: The collars look great when they arrive, and the seller is prompt. However, the reflective material begins to deteriorate immediately. It frays where it is stitched. In my case, I had my dog's name and my phone number embroidered by the seller and that accelerated the deterioration of the reflective stripe. I ordered 2 collars. The first one has only lasted about 2 weeks before falling apart. I was pleased when the collars arrived. The look great when brand new. 2 weeks later, not so much so.
customer_reviews.author: P. Dailey

customer_reviews.title: NIGHT OWLS
customer_reviews.text: This collar meets all my expectations. I would advise sizing down. I measured according to company's recommendations, but it's so big that part of the personalization is covered up. Still, it is perfect for my companion, Tucker's, needs. He and I are both night owls and I love that this collar is reflective. Also, I feel so much better that his name and my phone number are on the collar in case he wanders off (this happened once when he was first adopted). It remains to be seen how the buckle holds up, but he's small and doesn't pull on the leash or take off after other dogs so I think we'll be okay.
customer_reviews.author: NMJacoby

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: I just want to say thank you so much for refunding my money when you didn’t have to. Our Lucy girl was our whole world and her very unexpected death has broken our hearts beyond anything we’ve ever experienced. Thank you so much for your kindness and I will be recommending your company to every dog and cat owner I know. In a world when you could have chosen to be anything, you chose to be kind and I pray that kindness blesses you ten fold.
customer_reviews.author: SMC

customer_reviews.title: Saved my Dog when she got lost.
customer_reviews.text: Previous collar from this vendor should have been replaced before now, but I just never got around to it. It suffered great abuse for more than 4 years, yet was still legible for a 10 year to phone us and coordinate for her rescue. If not for the collar we would have lost a valued member of our family. High quality materials, craftsmanship, fit and function. This is a replacement for the original. Thanks for a great product. Vr
customer_reviews.author: Laney M Pankey

customer_reviews.title: Great product, awesome customer service!
customer_reviews.text: I really like this collar, it is nicely reflective and the stitching looks great. The best part is the spectacular customer service. I made a mistake on my order and didn’t notice it until the collar arrived with an incorrect phone number. I contacted the seller and verified it was my mistake. They sent me a new collar with the correct number, for free. No questions asked. And it arrived as fast as the first one. Wonderful customer service!! Thank you so much!!
customer_reviews.author: Courage Michele

customer_reviews.title: Dangerous - Extremely Difficult to Open/Close -  Can pinch your finger or your dog
customer_reviews.text: Pros - reflective, name and phone are correct, the reflective layer acts as a "2nd" layer to make the collar thicker (I can no longer seem to find double thickness nylon collars and leashes) Cons - the clasp is extremely difficult to open and close. So difficult it is dangerous and could do some serious damange to a person's finger or your dog if part of him got pinched in it while closing shut. Would not buy again. Cannot use since I can't get it open and shut. It's dangerous product
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: FANTASTIC!
customer_reviews.text: I love this! Got a new collar for my fiancee fur baby and best friend. She goes everywhere with him. The company did a wonderful job putting her name and his phone number on her collar. It came in very fast and workmanship was incredible. The collar is reflective as advertised and very easy to spot when she is outside at night taking care of business. I would definitely recommend this to anyone with fur babies. Would definitely order from this company again!
customer_reviews.author: Cathy Ackerman

customer_reviews.title: Colorful and lightweight
customer_reviews.text: This is the perfect collar for my small dogs. Usually when you get a collar with customization - it's heavy. My Boston Terriers (3) don't like collars, but we moved and so I needed the name and phone number on each dog in order to sleep at night. GOod colors, the name and phone number stitching was good and I liked the fact that it has a reflector piece to the color so the dog can be seen at night. I bought 3 and I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: L. Bledsoe

customer_reviews.title: Best dog collar to keep you dog safe
customer_reviews.text: I've bought several of these collars over the last few years, for my rescue dogs. I've never been disappointed with the workmanship or quality. The white reflective background that the embroidery is on, stays white and always reflective. The embroidery is clear and precise, and the collar is of sturdy quality, with a good plastic clasp that will not come undone. I don't worry about a collar coming off or a id tag becoming worn and unreadable with this. Every dog deserves a collar like this.
customer_reviews.author: Pamela Golden

customer_reviews.title: I have 2 dogs and bought them each this collar ...
customer_reviews.text: I have 2 dogs and bought them each this collar. My medium sized 45 lb dog still wears hers 2 years later. It does help me to see her in the dark. My other dog is a very strong 65 lb dog who is dark brown/black. This collar did make him visible if the lighting was just right but he snapped the buckle on the collar after wearing it for a few months. My suggestion is to use this collar as a backup over an existing more solid buckle type collar. Another suggestion is for the designer to make a collar with a metal buckle instead of a snap and click backpack type buckle.
customer_reviews.author: Cherie Allen

customer_reviews.title: Durable and good quality
customer_reviews.text: I am just writing a review “it’s March 2020” and we have had these since November 2019. I have 2 large dogs and bought them each this collar. I am very happy with the product. Still is holding up great and looks nice. I love that they do not have to have tags dangling down as in the past they have always fell off. I also think the price point is great. I would definitely recommend and purchase again in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Great lakes

customer_reviews.title: It’s a pc of crap! Its faded and worn after just a few ...
customer_reviews.text: The positive reviews must have gotten a different collar than me. It’s a pc of crap! Its faded and worn after just a few months. Cant even read the writing on the collar anymore and it looks like its 10 years old now. Junk.
customer_reviews.author: C. Trapani

customer_reviews.title: Identity dog collars
customer_reviews.text: AWESOME collars! Fast delivery. Came 3 days earlier than said. My boxers necks measure 18-19". I wanted the 1" collars as they are muscular dogs & 1" would look better on them. The L says fits 18"-26". Thought these would be ok. What I DIDN'T realize is that because I have to take up a lot of slack to fit, the buckle interferes with the embroidery of the phone # . 😢 That's the only thing I am disappointed with. I wanted a red, white, & blue theme. So I got 1 blue collar w/ red writing, & 1 red collar w/ blue writing. The reflective part is silver. Can see the names & phone # very well.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah

customer_reviews.title: Very good alternative to  name tags
customer_reviews.text: These are good quality collars. I have purchased for 2 dogs and the only complaint I have is with the placement of the monogram information. Both of my dogs neck sizes fall toward the lower end of the size range and the plastic sliding piece to adjust size covers part of their name. Not sure if there's a way to get around this. Otherwise this is a great collar with excellent reflectivity.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: easy to read, reflection matters
customer_reviews.text: Great product, however, I measured my dog's neck and still ordered larger than I should have. It has ALOT of extra leeway to lengthen, so if I had to purchase again, I would go smaller. I ended up cutting a bit off and resewing to shorten it. It was very close to working without shortening it , but my dog was still able to slip the collar. I got it because we moved and I want to be sure she can be identified as quickly as possible if she got out of the house. This is a quality product and I would purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: ddw

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with my purchase
customer_reviews.text: I purchased 3 of these collars a couple of weeks ago and, so far, I really like them. They are well made without being stiff and uncomfortable. The reflective strip is wide and easily picks up any available light. My dogs were at the bottom of our property last night and one of the flood lights made it easy to spot the collar. Under the conditions, we would not have been able to easily spot the dogs otherwise. The quality of the embroidery is also very good and easy to read. I’m very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: KeiL

customer_reviews.title: I Purchased this collar And couldn’t be happier. It fits my dog very well it’s not ...
customer_reviews.text: When my dog was refusing to drink water out of his bowl we realized the tags were clanging against the metal bowl which scared him. I Purchased this collar And couldn’t be happier. It fits my dog very well it’s not huge and overbearing. I also like the fact that it’s reflective so when we walk at night I feel a little safer. The color I chose was bright and pretty as well. I’m very happy with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Maureen

customer_reviews.title: Collars may cause allergic reactions!
customer_reviews.text: I loved this collar when it first arrived!! It was beautiful and very reflective and lovely! My dog started wearing it and a few weeks later, I noticed that he was getting some sores near the collar. I was putting medicine on it and they were getting worse. So I took the collar off, not connecting the collar with the sores at this point, to heal the sores. When the sores were healed; I put the collar back on and in two days, this happened! Look at the photo. The vet said it is a sever allergic reaction to something, and I think it is the collar.
customer_reviews.author: Hawaii girl

customer_reviews.title: GREAT personalized Reflective collars
customer_reviews.text: We use this collars on our dogs with both their name and phone #.....just as good, we foster dogs for Lab Rescues and we have several sizes with only our phone number on them to use for our "temporary" dog guests. they are an easy and effective way for our neighbors to know how to reach us if one of our "newbie" dos slips out and loses their way in the neighborhood. They hold up well in the water (we swim our labs in the river as well as our pool) and give an easy to read reference instead of having those hard metal tags on the collars
customer_reviews.author: DanH

customer_reviews.title: Best collar ever.
customer_reviews.text: I have bought a few of these collars for my two dogs and they are the best ones I have ever bought. My dogs wear the orange ones in the Fall during hunting season and other colors during the rest of the year. The collars are durable and appear to be comfortable to wear. But the best part for us is the reflective feature which allows us to see our dogs when they go out in the dark at night for that last bathroom visit before bed.
customer_reviews.author: S. F. Morris

customer_reviews.title: Fast and Perfect
customer_reviews.text: We have a rather hefty cat who needed a larger-than-usual collar. Most of the small dog collars are too wide. He's also an indoor/outdoor cat so the collar had to be highly reflective. We've lost several break-away collars so I didn't want that. GoTags had everything our cat needed. We had them include the cat's name and our phone number. It fits well, is highly reflective, and looks pretty darned good on him, too. The collar came quickly after our order, and was perfect in every way.
customer_reviews.author: Grandma Ellie

customer_reviews.title: I bought the wrong size
customer_reviews.text: I Had previously bought a large size for my GSD, while it was a little too big, it worked ok, but the lettering failed after a few years. So , learning from my mistake, I bought a medium. What they don't tell you is that not only is it shorter ,it is much thinner, so the lettering is, in my opinion, very hard to read. My bad, relatively good product, now have to go back and order a large.
customer_reviews.author: D., G. Menchetti

customer_reviews.title: My Go to dog collars
customer_reviews.text: I bought replacement collars from Go Tags because my dogs have had their original ones I purchased over 2 years ago and I wanted a new color scheme. The old ones were a bit faded but the embroidery and working parts still functioned, quite durable. I particularly like my dogs name and my phone number very visible on the collar itself as they tend to lose their ID and vet tags, excellent craftsmanship. Again, I just bought new ones to update to new colors and I’m impressed by their sturdiness because I have a 84 pound German Shepherd and a 55 pound Shepherd-Shelty cross, they’re busy girls
customer_reviews.author: Lisa M. Green

customer_reviews.title: Great buy- easy to order
customer_reviews.text: This is the 6th collar we have purchased from this company and amazon- they are great collars- sturdy- colorful and I recieved them faster than the estimated date of delivery. The other thing that was nice is ordering them is very easy. I highly recommend these colors. The fact that they are also reflective has been a plus. The only reason I had to get replacements this time is because my dogs got hit by a skunk and I couldn’t get the smell out of the collars. Would order them again.
customer_reviews.author: Donna

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, cool options.
customer_reviews.text: I’ve purchased 3 GoTags collars so far. The quality is good. My dog is a 60lb Shepard/Pitbull mix and the medium fits him perfectly. I got the reflective collar and really happy I did because it helps you and anyone else to more easily see my dog at night. It’s cool how they let you choose your color combination too. Lighter colors on the reflective color won’t show up well though. A printed collar is the way to go, absolutely. No more jingle of a tag every time my dog moves or turns his head.
customer_reviews.author: Jaxman223

customer_reviews.title: Good collar, until it wasn't.
customer_reviews.text: Bought one of these for my dog about eight months ago. By the second month, the reflective tape had completely worn off, leaving the text and the collar pristine. Fine, figured it was a glitch, was offered a replacement by the vendor, which I happily accepted. Now, four months later, the exact same thing has happened, and the vendor flatly refused to do anything. I get that they have a warranty and that I'm beyond it, but when something is obviously flawed, a little goodwill goes a long way. My other dog has had his collar from them for two years, and nothing like this has happened to his.
customer_reviews.author: Atrius

customer_reviews.title: Strong reflective collars
customer_reviews.text: We have gone through several collars with our gsd and mix. They play really rough and pull each others collars off, usually by stretching or loosening them. These collars have been on both of them for over a week with no issues. I love that they are reflective and have our ph number. No tags to fall off! These are very well made, sturdy collars. I highly recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: Sandy McMahon

customer_reviews.title: Awsome reflective dog collar and awsome customer service
customer_reviews.text: This dog collar is awsome and the customer service is even more awsome!! I had ordered 2 dog collars and I had made a tiny mistake with one of the digits of my phone number. I had asked if there was any way to fix it and they gave me new one with the correct number on it! Awsome customer service! Also love the reflective collars as it keeps my dogs safe when I take them for a walknat night. Also the quality is very nice. I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Student123

customer_reviews.title: This is a nice collar, I love the options to customize it
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice collar, I love the options to customize it, and the colors turned out really nice and vibrant. The only con is that, once we fitted it around our dog's neck, half the lettering was no longer visible. We have a medium sized dog, and ordered according to the neck length recommended, but it was way too big.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Collar stay lands right in the middle of the collar name!!
customer_reviews.text: As you can see from the image the collar stay sits right in the middle of the name / phone number. I’d like to note we ordered the correct length as determined by the amazon listing, small. The funny thing is, had the info been printed further down the collar this wouldn’t be an issue. So, it seems to me to be avoidable. I’m not going to recommend this and am a little bummed!
customer_reviews.author: Steven P.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars - Only Because I couldn't give TEN.
customer_reviews.text: I have bought 3 of these collars in the past few years and they all look brand new. I especially like the reflective properties of theses collars. Not only is it safer for the animals should the get out, but it's easier to find the buggers when they're playing hide and seek in the foliage of the fenced back yard. Don't let the delivery estimate fool you. I suspect that it's a worst case scenario. All of my collars were delivered VERY fast - almost as if they had the dog's name and phone number in stock!
customer_reviews.author: JJB

customer_reviews.title: Stop looking around, get this collar! Read their sizing instructions.
customer_reviews.text: YESSS!!! PROs: Excellent customer service, great price, durable, embroidery is sturdy, lightweight, water resistant, and people compliment my pup on this everywhere we go. And I can easily see my pup at night now!!! CONs: Reflectiveness makes for weird photos sometimes. That is the worst thing I can think of...because this collar is AMAZING!!! And a special thank you to customer service for telling me how to measure and what size to order. Their sizing is not intuitive, so make sure you ask if you're not sure. They responded quickly via email and are super knowledgeable & friendly. Really, I just want to order a bunch more in different color combinations and rotate them!!!
customer_reviews.author: Elissa

customer_reviews.title: cannot read embroidery great when adjusted to size
customer_reviews.text: Product looks great and is great quality. I was a little upset with the sizing. I followed the sizing in the images, but it was still huge when not adjusted to size. Unfortunately when tightened, it covers the embroidery so you can't read it well, which defeats the purpose of it. very disappointed in that fact.
customer_reviews.author: Julia

customer_reviews.title: Not sure....
customer_reviews.text: We really like these collars but the buckle keeps breaking! If we pull hard (but not unreasonably hard) on the leash the buckle snaps. It loses one side of the plastic tong thingys. Then it’s not longer useful. This is our second one that has done that. So bummed because I have to order another one or go with a different higher end brand.
customer_reviews.author: Angie

customer_reviews.title: Buckle isn't strong enough for my lab
customer_reviews.text: I originally LOVED this collar. It held up for a little over a year. But a few days ago our two year old lab had a burst of energy and darted towards another dog. I grabbed her collar and it snapped IMMEDIATELY. Scariest thing ever. Luckily our dog is friendly (she just doesn't know how big she is) and our neighbors were nice about it. Could have been much worse. I gave it 2 stars because this is a nice collar but should never be used on a strong dog. We bought another collar and the teeth on the buckle are so much bigger and stronger. Wish I would have known the difference.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: doesn't last
customer_reviews.text: collar construction is good. stitching is well done the reflective fabric is not a good quality for this purpose. within a week of use there were vertical wear lines caused by the buckle... so as puppy grew, you can't read his name. also the collar no longer reflects very well - it's not as bright as when it was new - which makes it useless to us - can't find the jet black dog at night, can't read his name in the day... very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: pat costello

customer_reviews.title: WORKS!
customer_reviews.text: I needed something that is sturdy, effective, and reasonable in price. These collars meet my expectations. I have ordered from them several times (as I do rehab, the residents can change :-) and on two occasions- I needed to contact Customer Service. Customer Service was courteous, fair, and fast in remedying the problem. So- you have a good, sturdy product- at a fair price- and a good Customer Service team to back it.....Sounds like a "no-brainer" :-)
customer_reviews.author: Baamaid

customer_reviews.title: Decent collar
customer_reviews.text: This is the second set I have ordered. They are very reflective at night and having the dogs info on them is great. My only complaint would be they started to fade a fair bit after a year or so and hence why I am replaced them. I also wish they were available in a bit wider width in each size. Also if you had a very big and strong dog I am not sure I would use this with a leash as the buckle does not feel as robust as some. We use a harness when walking dogs so not issue for us and might even be a safety plus if they ever got it snagged on something.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Collar!
customer_reviews.text: I'm very excited about this collar. It's even better looking in person. Stitching is beautiful, love that I was able to pick the colors. It's very reflective and looks great on my pup! Also very happy that it's even easier if my pup got out for someone to give us a call without having to go to a vet to get his chip scanned. Can't recommend enough.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa R

customer_reviews.title: Well Made, Excellent Customer Service
customer_reviews.text: Arrived ahead of schedule, very well made and the colors are accurate to the photos. Not a single disappointment. Please remember that the reflective material is only as bright as your dog is clean. I purchased this collar for a rescue dog and had to wash both the dog and the collar upon arrival at home. Both cleaned up nicely.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin from CT

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with it.
customer_reviews.text: It looks exactly like the stock pictures. I've had it for about a week. It reflects extraordinarily well at night. The lettering is visible from the back of my dog's neck. I ordered and recommend listing the phone number first than your pet's name second. Both my number and my dog's name are visible, but if I ever have to move the plastic adjustment to make the collar bigger it will cover his name and not the phone number. Embroidered is great, because I don't have to be concerned about the letters/numbers rubbing off or fading.
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: Poor Quality.
customer_reviews.text: This broke the 3rd day my dog wore it. The clasp broke apart when he pulled his leash. We were lucky he didn't run off when he became free.
customer_reviews.author: LittleSaintina

customer_reviews.title: Quality Product! Great Customer Service
customer_reviews.text: The quality of GoTags collars are second to none. My family has used this brand for multiple dogs ranging in sizes (from our parents German Shepard to Shih Tzu). Recently, I ordered a collar for my small dog who has been struggling with a few kidney issues and as a result has lost a few pounds. When we found the collar did not fit I sent a message to customer service who immediately responded and were eager to resolve. They did everything in their power to resolve the issue and were extremely kind and understanding through the process. You could not ask for a better company to do business with!
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: Nice!
customer_reviews.text: My dog has a tendency to snag his tags when we are out camping or just at the lake, going through the brushes. So i was lookig for something that would stay on him so if he was lost his tags may be gone but there is still a way to have him found. I found this collar on amazon and though huh looks nice. When i received it I was pleasantly surprised. It looked good and the stitching on the reflector really stood out. It is a very sturdy collar that looks like it will last until I buy another one for a color change.
customer_reviews.author: Mary A.

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good, stitching could be tighter
customer_reviews.text: It's a pretty good collar. We ordered 5 for our dogs (my parents 3 and my 2) because my lab mix lost his tags 3 times in 2 days in our home. Loved the idea of my phone number stitched on the collar in case it happened if he got lost. I also have a black German shepherd who is really hard to see at night which is why we went with the reflective one. The reflective material is pretty thick and sturdy. The reason I gave it 3 stars is because the stitching is starting to unravel a bit and we've only had these collars for about a month.
customer_reviews.author: Gcasey

customer_reviews.title: I have a large standard poodle (65lbs) and I ordered ...
customer_reviews.text: I have a large standard poodle (65lbs) and I ordered her a medium sized collar. It fit perfectly with a lot of room to make it bigger. I just wish the medium had a thicker band, however it serves its purpose. You can see the reflection across the yard, and her name and my phone number are perfectly printed on it. I have gotten many compliments on it, and I also refer them back to here. I have had it for a few months and the print is as clear as the day I ordered it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good idea
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this for our German shepherd who is an escape artist. He also isn’t a fan of collars and constantly would lose his ID tags. This was a good solution because it stays on, is a nice material and we could have our contact material directly on the collar. It’s been over 7 months and it’s still holding up.
customer_reviews.author: Anna

customer_reviews.title: Will buy again
customer_reviews.text: PROS: Works exactly as described; very strong pitbull mix dog & easily holds up to the intermittent crazy pulling to try to meet other dogs. Name & number easily visible at a distance, bright reflective material. CONS: Spacing with collar adjustment obscures part of number or name, likely true of all products like this. Still highly functional. Will buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Maggie

customer_reviews.title: LOVE these
customer_reviews.text: I've purchased two of these. One we've had for long enough to know they hold up and the newest one just purchased for the newest addition to our family. They're very durable and adorable. My dogs are fast and I know if they ever got out, they will easily be able to be identified. I love the multicolor thread colors also. One of my dogs is a black lab x border collie so the reflector strip is very reassuring to me.
customer_reviews.author: Austin E.

customer_reviews.title: The collar fits perfect
customer_reviews.text: The collar is designed very well and fits great around her neck with room to grow (med). We love how the design if reflective and has her name and phone number on the collar vs others where it is attached by loops that can break. With a solid Black Lab we needed the reflective design.
customer_reviews.author: Bridget Demette

customer_reviews.title: Highly reflective - great investment
customer_reviews.text: The material on this collar is highly reflective - I was pleasantly surprised at how brightly the reflective band "glowed" at night with just a little bit of light shining on it. The stitching is really high quality. The one inch width is great for font size. Lettering is easy to read. We selected red collar with black lettering and it looks amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Lori Ellison

customer_reviews.title: Reflects light extremely well
customer_reviews.text: Our kids were visiting and one of their dogs escaped and within the hour, a neighbor called their phone and said your dog is over here. we didn’t even know the dog was gone. Reflects light extremely well. letters are large enough and clear enough to be easily read. Will buy another if this one gives up.
customer_reviews.author: Bluehonyak

customer_reviews.title: Very good quality
customer_reviews.text: I have a very small 4 lb dog and a very large 70 lb dog. The little one loves to escape and an embroidered collar is a must. This is my second purchase as these collars are fantastic and durable. The sizes offered allow me to purchase matching collars for both dogs. The reflective material and lettering are very clear and last for a very long time. I would recommend to anyone and have. I will always purchase from them. No need to look further.
customer_reviews.author: Leslie Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Like
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a size too big because i wanted the extra width. Lucky it fits loosely when fully adjusted to smallest size. Wish the small came in the same width as med. Either way he's a puppy and will grow into it and this might be the only thing I've ordered on Amazon thats showed up on time this year. Good product.
customer_reviews.author: QWERTY

customer_reviews.title: It looks good with quality lettering and I like the reflectivity
customer_reviews.text: Collar was delivered quickly. It looks good with quality lettering and I like the reflectivity. Two problems: 1) I must readjust the size almost every time I take the dog out, placing the last digit of my phone number in the middle of the buckle. It slips and becomes larger on every walk. This seems to be a problem over time on most clip style collars vs buckle collars but this one slips quickly. 2) My dog is a 1 year old 55-pound boxer mix. I wanted a large one-inch wide collar but he only has a 17 inch neck, one inch short of the large minimum measurement, so I had to get the 3/4 inch wide medium.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick Sterling

customer_reviews.title: Collar great - clasp could use improvement
customer_reviews.text: The reflective collar is very nice - reflects light and colors are good. The plastic "buckle" is less desirable. This is our 3rd collar. The first one Georgia was wearing with a leash, dashed to chase a squirrel and the collar popped off and broke. The 2nd one was Georgia's fault - she wasn't wearing it, found it, and chewed the plastic buckle. I ordered a third one which we use for identification only. I will never attach a leash to it as it's not strong enough for this STRONG squirrel hunter. She sure looks good in it, though!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Enhanced safety and attractive.
customer_reviews.text: New owner of a rescue dog. Wanted to help assure her safe return should she stray. Also, since she is a dark chocolate brown, thought a reflective collar was a safety issue, though I am training her to sit before she reaches the edge of the road. Ordered the orange color with lime green lettering to match her leash. She is quite attractive in her new collar! Delivered as promised, actually surprised me how quickly it arrived. And a reasonable price for such good service, and a sturdy collar.
customer_reviews.author: BoomerGrandma

customer_reviews.title: Good Collar
customer_reviews.text: I have bought a few of these. My new puppy thinks its a grand idea to pull the collar off my other dog and chew it up. I have bought two others, which serious lacked in workmanship and quality. The clasps broke, and said puppy was able to chew into pieces in a matter of minutes. This one however, is made much better. The collar itself is thicker and more sturdy. I highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Airdiddy

customer_reviews.title: Shines at night but too harsh material
customer_reviews.text: It is beautiful and helped me find my dog in the middle of the night in Forest area. I have 4 stars because it scraped my Chihuahua neck. It was bleeding underneath. I had a take it off until he heals. I will try a puppy collar and put this on top of that collar. I'll update the review on how it goes.
customer_reviews.author: Sabina

customer_reviews.title: highly recommended
customer_reviews.text: I have bought two of these dog collars in the last two months in different sizes. The dog's name and phone number are embroidered on the collar rather than printed on which rubs off. The info is embroidered on relective tape sewn onto the color of collar you choose to help protect the dog to be seen in car headlights at night. Even though the info is embroidered onto the collar, the manufacturer gets the collar to you pronto. I marvel at how fast your order arrives, so yes, I will order more in the future if needed and highly recommend these collars. Measure your dog to get the right size and you will be very pleased!!
customer_reviews.author: Sharon

customer_reviews.title: Is the collar truly reflective?
customer_reviews.text: As our dog is pure black, I ordered the dog collar specifically for reflective & Go Tag collar that it was advertised for. However the collar I received has little or no reflective quality, nd when I addressed this matter with the Company,: based on a photo of the collar I sent, their response was that the collar looked fine. I responded by advising that I have had several dogs and several reflective collars, and the one they sent me had NO reflective quality at all, & i felt it was simply a poor quality item. Thus, I will never purchase another collar from this Company.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Goehrig

customer_reviews.title: If it gets wet, it will smell!
customer_reviews.text: I loved this collar at the beginning, but after a month and a half it stunk so bad!! Our puppy plays in her pool a lot, and I assume that when it got continually wet it started to get moldy or something. I thought that the puppy smelled, but luckily it was just her collar. I couldn't even put it in the indoor garbage, I put it outside. It was absolutely horrible. If your dog gets wet a lot, don't get it!
customer_reviews.author: kvl

customer_reviews.title: Great quality!
customer_reviews.text: Over the years, we have adopted many, many rescue dogs. Even though all of our dogs are microchipped, we buy these collars for them as added security. These collars are of very good quality & last a long time. When they get dirty, I just toss them in the washer with my colors. I also like the fact that they are reflective.
customer_reviews.author: Critter Mom

customer_reviews.title: Poor design - part of the phone number is covered up.
customer_reviews.text: I got this collar because it looked like it was well made. Based on the measurements of my dog's neck and the size descriptions on the web, I ordered a medium. To get it to fit my dog's neck properly, I had to tighten it a bit and a part of my phone number is covered up. This is a major problem. My dog is skittish and I wanted to display my phone number so if she got away and someone saw her, they'd be able to identify her without having to actually touch her. The collar is useless to me now except as something to which I can attach a leash. I'll have to look for something else.
customer_reviews.author: Crosswycke

customer_reviews.title: Works well. Has lasted 5 months. Need to move tag.
customer_reviews.text: I got a medium for my labrador puppy. It fit him from when he was 30 lbs and still fits at 65 lbs. The problem I have is the same as everyone else, the go tags label is right in the way of the writing. It was impossible to see the dogs name and my phone number until he grew to be 45-50 lbs and i stretched the collar out. The medium still fits my dog at 65lbs but it is a little narrow. I'm worried if I buy a large the tag will cover up his name again. Move the tag to the other end!!
customer_reviews.author: Brian R. Jacobs

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous pet collars!
customer_reviews.text: This is the second time I have purchased a GoTags collar and will continue to do so! The one for my Beagle is still in perfect condition after roughly two years of wear and tear and this one for Bear is beautiful! I have recommended these to other pet parents and will continue to do so!
customer_reviews.author: Jessie

customer_reviews.title: Quick turnaround, as advertised.
customer_reviews.text: I really wish I could have had a bit wider collar, but this one works. In spite of the upcoming Xmas holiday delivery was quick/ accurate (this is written several months later). Added after 6 months use: I'm very happy with it - and it didn't brake (as many have warned). I just ordered another one (large) for another dog. Received it and find it equally good (shipped coast to coast in just two days).
customer_reviews.author: Fox

customer_reviews.title: NOPE! GoTags messed up the collar and then make you pay to return it to them!
customer_reviews.text: The company didn't center the name and number properly for the neck measurement so the buckle covers the number. The collar is very stiff and not comfortable for smaller dogs. And then the company makes you pay to return a product that is useless to them because it's personalized. I would not recommend this company or their collars. There are plenty of better companies make better personalized collars out there.
customer_reviews.author: Bristol Girl

customer_reviews.title: Great collar for large breed dogs
customer_reviews.text: This is a really great collar. I have a St Bernard mix and a purebred German Shepherd. After awhile the reflective material does start to wear off but it doesn’t affect the embroidery. It’s great to have your phone number listed and not have to listen to tags constantly jingle or fall off.
customer_reviews.author: Sara W

customer_reviews.title: Dog Collar with ID Imprint
customer_reviews.text: My doggie loves her collar, it's comfy - reflective - and it has her name and our phone number. It isn't heavy or jangle like a leather collar and it dries quickly which is important for an active German Wirehaired Pointer type. Frieda gives TWO TWO PAWS UP and she will get one for her non-biological sister K9, Lucy Q.
customer_reviews.author: beaner1959

customer_reviews.title: ... up to the tussling of two hyper labs (their favorite is to grab each other by the collar as ...
customer_reviews.text: We have had these almost 2 weeks and they seem to be holding up to the tussling of two hyper labs (their favorite is to grab each other by the collar as they "play"). They arrived very quickly too! The product itself is as expected, nice reflective surface with good stitching and the buckles seem robust enough. Pleased!
customer_reviews.author: Dr. mom

customer_reviews.title: Hard to adjust
customer_reviews.text: After I placed the order I was a bit disappointed as I thought it was a blue background with orange lettering, but then it would not be reflective. It is very reflective! It was hard to make it smaller. I still had his collar form LL Bean when my dog was a puppy. I liked theirs because I could my address, his name and a phone number. I did it with this one too, but it is without spaces. My dog is micro-chipped, but I like it so if he was lost, (God forbid) they could bring him home rather than to the Humane Society.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The reflection on it is great and the stitching is great
customer_reviews.text: I thought this product would be pretty durable especially the way the picture shows the product and for the $21.00 . when I got it I was kind of upset with how thin and cheap it seeme.d but the reflective material on it works great and the stitching on it for the name and phone number came out real great though overall it's okay for the price.. But it sure does servethe purpose.
customer_reviews.author: Kimball

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with this dog collar.
customer_reviews.text: I’m very happy with the reflective dog collar. I have purchased this product before and am a repeat customer. I love the extra visibility the reflective surface of this collar provides, and I love that my phone number is embroidered right on the collar. My dogs have gotten their dog tags stuck in the floor vents of my home, so I feel like it is important to have my contact information on the collar itself since I have removed the dog tags for the safety of my dogs. I definitely recommend this product and would definitely purchase this product again.
customer_reviews.author: Janalyn

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: This is actually a retro-reflextive collar, which was an awesome added bonus! No matter how much or the angle the light is coming in this collar glows. Shipped sooner than originally told. Also I have a large goldador and a standard large doesn't normally fit my guy but we had to actually tighten the collar up. Every thing about this purchase exceeded my expectations!! *Update* My messy dog has gotten the collar all dingy and it's still really reflective. Such a great product.
customer_reviews.author: Kiki Cakes

product_meta.title: GoTags Reflective Personalized Dog Collar, Custom Embroidered with Pet Name and Phone Number in Blue, Black, Pink, Red and Orange, for Boy and Girl Dogs, 3 Adjustable Sizes, Small, Medium, and Large
product_meta.description:
Our personalized dog collars are made and shipped from the USA in 1-2 business days after an order is placed. Our shop is in Washington state. Don’t choose a collar from China that ships slowly overseas.

Durably made with safety, comfort and function in mind, our long-lasting dog ID collar is highly reflective and offers: 
smooth, tapered edges for a comfortable fit 
strong, non-corrosive stainless steel D-ring for attaching tags and leash 
high quality and secure side-release buckle for easy one handed release
5 collar colors to choose from: Blue, Black, Orange, Pink, and Red 

Personalized Embroidery: 
embroidery is permanently stitched through the collar for strength and long-lasting identification 
15 embroidery thread color options to choose from for your personalized text 
personalized text (e.g., dog name & phone number) limited to 25 characters maximum, including spaces 
collars are personalized using all CAPITAL letters for legibility 

Collar Sizing and Fit:
To determine the correct collar size for your dog, use a soft tape measure or piece of string and wrap it snugly around the base of your dog’s neck – snug enough so that you cannot fit any fingers under the measuring tape. Your pet’s measured neck size must fit within the collar’s adjustable length range. For instance, if your dog’s neck measures 13” inches order an 11”-16” inch adjustable collar. 
3 adjustable collar sizes: 
- Small (5/8” inch wide by 11”-16” inches in adjustable length) 
- Medium (3/4” inch wide by 14”-20” inches in adjustable length) 
- Large (1” inch wide by 18”-26” inches in adjustable length) 
please note: In some cases, when sizing the collar down there is a possibility that the adjustable slider could rest over some of the custom embroidery.

English alphabet characters only.
feature_bullets: BE VISIBLE DAY OR NIGHT. Made with durability and safety in mind, our highly reflective, personalized collar offers optimal comfort and increased visibility for you and your dog.

OUR REFLECTIVE DOG COLLAR IS EMBROIDERED with your dog’s name & phone number. The embroidery is permanently stitched into the collar for strength and long-lasting durability. The collar also features a secure plastic side-release buckle and a non-corrosive stainless steel D-ring. In addition to the highly-reflective surface the collar is made of nylon webbing with smooth, tapered edges for a comfortable fit. This collar has everything you need: durability, safety, and customization.
3 ADJUSTABLE COLLAR SIZES: Small (5/8 inch wide by 11-16 inches adjustable length), Medium (3/4 inch wide by 14-20 inches adjustable length), Large (1 inch wide by 18-26 inches adjustable length).

WHEN CUSTOMIZING YOUR COLLAR, PLEASE ENTER: (1) COLLAR COLOR: Blue, Black, Orange, Pink, or Red; (2) THREAD COLOR: White, Black, Navy Blue, Neon Pink, Baby Pink, Sky Blue, Purple, Neon Yellow, Neon Green, Neon Orange, Red, Gold, Turquoise, Cotton Candy, or Jolly Rancher; (3) COLLAR SIZE: Small, Medium, or Large; (4) COLLAR TEXT: Pet Name and Phone Number - 25 characters max. When finished customizing collar, click Add to Cart.
TO SEE ALL OF OUR PET ID PRODUCTS, click on our brand name GOTAGS above the product listing title.

specifications.Customer Reviews: /** Fix for UDP-1061. Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
